profile.name: Joyson Fernandes
profile.title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
profile.summary: Passionate about automation, cloud architecture, and building efficient infrastructure solutions with AWS, Azure, and DevOps best practices.

experiences.title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
experiences.description: Leading cloud infrastructure design and implementation for enterprise clients while mentoring new engineers.
achievements: Designing and implementing cloud infrastructure solutions for enterprise clients
Mentoring new DevOps engineers in cloud best practices and automation
Leading migration projects from on-premises to cloud environments
Developing Infrastructure as Code templates for rapid deployment

experiences.title: Infrastructure Support Analyst
experiences.description: Managing critical infrastructure supporting 500+ users with focus on uptime and automation.
achievements: Managed critical infrastructure supporting 500+ users with 99.5% uptime
Implemented automated monitoring solutions reducing incident response time by 60%
Led virtualization projects using VMware vSphere and Hyper-V
Developed PowerShell scripts for system administration and automation

experiences.title: Senior 2nd Line Support Engineer
experiences.description: Provided technical support for complex infrastructure issues across multiple sites.
achievements: Provided technical support for complex infrastructure issues across multiple sites
Improved ticket resolution time by 45% through process optimization
Collaborated with development teams on application deployment strategies
Maintained and updated system documentation and knowledge base

experiences.title: Senior ICT Support Engineer
experiences.description: Led a team of engineers in daily operations and implemented disaster recovery solutions.
achievements: Led a team of 3 junior engineers in daily operations and problem resolution
Implemented backup and disaster recovery solutions improving data protection
Managed network infrastructure including VLANs, VPNs, and security policies
Reduced system downtime by 35% through proactive monitoring and maintenance

experiences.title: ICT Support Engineer
experiences.description: Provided comprehensive IT support across multiple departments with excellent customer service.
achievements: Provided comprehensive IT support for 200+ users across multiple departments
Maintained Windows Server environments and Active Directory infrastructure
Implemented user access management and security compliance procedures
Achieved 95% user satisfaction rating through excellent customer service
